espaluz.title: EspaLuz
espaluz.subtitle: WhatsApp AI Spanish Tutor
espaluz.desc: Emotionally intelligent conversational tutor for expats & travelers across 19 Spanish-speaking countries. Real dialogue, not word-by-word translation.
espaluz.traction: Growing organically with early user adoption across Panama and LATAM • PayPal Subscriptions LIVE, Crypto integrated
espaluz.tech: Python, OpenAI GPT, WhatsApp API, LangChain, Conversation Design

algom.title: ALGOM Alpha
algom.subtitle: AI Crypto Advisor for Post-Scammer Era
algom.desc: AI crypto mentor for beginner traders — teaching basics, safe trading, and digital literacy. Autonomous paper trading with real-time market analysis across 5 exchanges using technical indicators (LIVE on X and Railway).
algom.traction: First 180 followers attracted • Engaging crypto community through trading education and auto-posting market insights with paper trading results to X
algom.tech: Node.js, Eliza OS, CCXT (5 exchanges), Twitter API v2, WebSocket, Technical indicators (MA, RSI)

section3.title: AIdeazz Ecosystem — The Vision
section3.desc1: Ecosystem of emotionally intelligent AI companions — built to help people grow, succeed, and thrive. In learning languages. In relocation. In career shift and professional transformation. And other life challenges.
section3.desc2: Created not to replace people but mindfully evolve with them, helping them achieve new skills and learn faster because life is a permanent process of learning.
section3.vision: I believe every human will someday want their own emotionally intelligent AI companion — to become the best version of Self. Not generic chatbots, but deeply personal AI that grows alongside you.
